dreamy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: looking as though you are thinking about something pleasant rather than what is happening around you
dreamy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who is dreamy has a good imagination but is not very practical
dreamy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He was an artist, not particularly tidy, too dreamy to match her ways.
dreamy.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The windows cast a dreamy light in the room.
dreamy.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: a book of dreamy chocolate recipes
